XDir Platform - Management Infrustructure
-----------------------------------------------------
http://xdirplatform.org

1. INTRODUCTION

XDir Platform is a general purpose management infrustructure for your information and application stacks.
          
2. RUN

Run the startserver script and then lunch your browser to enjoy XDir at http://localhost:8888/

./bin/startserver.sh (Linux)
or
bin\startserver.bat (Windows)
